オプション1: Star Man told his companions what happened today.
"There's a dangerous man at this spot."
"He attacked me with a knife the moment we met."
"Why not meet him again and try talking properly?"
said Triangle Man.
"No... I didn't get the sense we could communicate."
Trapezoid Man made a grim face.
"Was he a scrawny guy?"
"No... if anything, he was a bit chubby."
"Then that's Noble. He was insanely fat, right?"
(I don't think he was that fat. Did he lose weight?)

"Stay away from Nes and Noble.
My legs ended up like this basically because of them."
"What happened...?"
"Well... a lot of things..."

"So they're at Gip Lighthouse now?  Before, at the port ruins.
Probably at these Virtual Bex Port Ruins.  Nes and Noble.  Nes is scrawny; Noble is fat. "

"Then maybe no one is at the Virtual Bex Port Ruins now?
Even without making a raft, if we go there we might get a boat."

"I don't think there was a boat.
We might find materials usable for a boat, though."
"I'll go check it out next time."
Trapezoid Man thought for a moment.
"Be careful."
"Yeah."
